titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the pro-rating of veterans compensation and pension for the month in which the death of a veteran occurs.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/25/1988--Introduced. Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide for the prorating of veterans' disability compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation, or pension benefits for the month in which the death of a veteran occurs.
